name: Swipe x Match
description:
The Most Explosive 60-Second Match-3 Game you want.
Swipe your finger fast. Match the blocks. Race the clock.
Beat your friends. Enjoy the explosive & stunning fever.

= How to play =

Swipe & match blocks before time’s up & break the highscore.

= Features =

FREE to play!
SIMPLE & easy to learn gameplay!
BOOST your fun with tons of items & upgrades, choose your path to excellence!
NEXT LEVEL explosive excitement with sparkly graphics & animations!
FEAST your ears with playful music & sound effects!
BEAT worldwide players in global leaderboard to prove your skills!
CHALLENGE your best friends in leaderboard & show your power!
